overview:
Laurent is highly recognized in the Mobile Phone Design industry, he is the owner of the “Mobile Phone Design group” on LinkedIn http://linkd.in/mobilephonedesign (>8,000 members in June ’12) and he is the co-founder of the #1 Telecom Networking Event in Shenzhen “International Mobile Phone Congress“ IMPC that occurs twice a year in Shenzhen.

In Oct 2005, Laurent got hired as Strategic Buyer by - Cellon / www.cellon.com -, at that time one of the world’s largest Mobile Phone ODM. After a company MBO (Avantech) and a later acquisition by Russian mobile phone brand - Fly Mobile / www.fly-phone.com - Laurent moved to Shenzhen / China in late 2007 to become Strategic Sourcing Manager in charge of Class A mobile phones components of the BOM and ODM outsourcing programs. During his Cellon and Avantech days he worked on strategic sourcing and ODM selection for the accounts of Philips Mobile China, Fly Russia & India and ModeLabs France (TAG Heuer Meridiist / Dior Phone projects).

While at Fly, Laurent met the whole Mobile Phone ODM players from Korea, Taiwan and China, he helped to develop the mobile phone line-up of Fly and contributed to the ODM strategy. He later joined Shenzhen Hi-Tech Park based Mobile Phone ODM - Umeox Mobile / www.umeox.com - in Aug 2009. At Umeox Mobile, Laurent worked as part of the board of directors on building Strategic Partnerships with brands, distributors and mobile network operators on a global basis.

In 2011, Laurent joined the Board of Advisors of San Francisco based company - Sonim Technologies / www.sonimtech.com - The leader in Ultra Rugged Mobile Phone and mobile enterprise services. He helped the company to develop ties through his network and set up alliances with strategic partners.

Laurent was appointed VP Strategic Alliances at Umeox Mobile in January 2012 with a goal to extend strong relationships with Key suppliers (chipset manufacturers and new breakthrough technology leaders) as well as Key customers both distributors and operators on a global basis.

Laurent holds a Business Administration degree from IUT Quimper - France, a Bachelor in International Purchasing Management from Avans Hogeschool - The Netherlands and a Master degree in Supply Chain Management from ISAAP Business School - France.
